pages.text:
Event Info
Host Your Event at Westchester Country Club
Westchester Country Club offers a stunning, versatile venue for all types of events. With a recently remodeled main dining room, banquet rooms that accommodate up to 250 guests, and picturesque outdoor spaces, our facilities are perfect for private celebrations, corporate gatherings, golf events, and more.
Whether you’re planning an intimate gathering or a grand affair, we’ll handle every detail to ensure your event is unforgettable.
Private & Social Events
Celebrate life’s special moments at Westchester Country Club! Whether it’s a birthday party, anniversary, retirement celebration, or Bar/Bat Mitzvah, our team will create a personalized experience for you and your guests.
What We Offer for Private Events:
Elegant indoor banquet rooms for up to 3
50 guests.
Outdoor spaces, including our gazebo surrounded by lush landscaping for a serene atmosphere.
Event planning services, including entertainment, decorations, and specialty lighting.
Custom menus tailored to your event theme or dietary needs.
Popular Private & Social Events We Host:
Weddings
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Birthday Parties
Anniversaries
Retirement Celebrations
Celebration of life
Baby showers
Engagement parties
Let our experienced event professionals make your occasion truly special, with impeccable service and attention to every detail.
Corporate Events
Elevate your next business meeting or corporate gathering by hosting it at Westchester Country Club. Our state-of-the-art facilities and exceptional service make us the ideal choice for professional events.
What We Offer for Corporate Events:
Private meeting rooms and banquet spaces with modern amenities.
Audiovisual equipment for presentations and training sessions.
Customized catering options, including formal meals or casual dining.
Capacity to accommodate both small team meetings and large conferences.
Popular Corporate Events We Host:
Business Meetings
Conferences
Team-Building Events
Awards Banquets
Our professional team ensures your event is executed seamlessly, so you can focus on achieving your goals.
Golf Events
Host a golf outing that combines the beauty of our 27-hole course with exceptional event facilities. Whether you’re planning a charity tournament, corporate golf day, or casual gathering with friends, Westchester Country Club is the perfect choice.
Planning an outing with 12 or more players?
Group bookings must be made by calling the Golf Shop directly.
One payment is required for the entire group (cash or credit).
What We Offer for Golf Events:
Access to our
27-hole Karl Litten-designed course
.
Event coordination, including tee times, scoring, and tournament setup.
Outdoor dining options and post-round celebrations at our banquet facility.
Catering packages designed to complement your golf outing.
Popular Golf Events We Host:
Charity Tournaments
Corporate Golf Days
Golf Leagues & Outings
Let us take care of the details so you can enjoy the perfect day on the course with your guests.
Catering Services
If you’re looking for exceptional cuisine without a venue, our
catering services
bring the best of Westchester Country Club to your location. Our talented culinary team can craft custom menus tailored to your needs, whether you’re planning a formal dinner, casual gathering, or themed event.
What We Offer for Catering:
Full-service catering for off-site events.
Kosher and non-Kosher menu options available.
Signature cocktails, hors d’oeuvres, and plated meals.
Dietary accommodations, including gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan options.
Let us handle the food while you focus on entertaining your guests.
Contact Us to Start Planning
Our experienced team has been creating unforgettable events since 2008. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we handle every aspect of event planning with precision and care.
Contact Deborah Young, Director of Catering, to discuss your event:
Phone: (561) 369-1000 ext 7502
Getting together with family and friends to celebrate life’s special moments is one of the greatest joys, and you don’t need to be a member of the club to take advantage of our fabulous facilities!

Memberships
Memberships at Westchester Country Club
2025-2026 Membership Programs – Enrollment begins on August 1, 2025
Experience the best of golf and amenities at Westchester Country Club with our all-inclusive membership packages. All memberships include taxes, greens fees, golf carts, range balls, a free GHIN membership, and a 10% discount at our Pro Shop and restaurant.
Restrictions Apply:
Couples must reside in the same household.
2024-2025 Annual Membership
Single:
$7,800
Couple:
$11,500
2024-2025 6-Month Membership (Summer Membership subject to availability)
Single:
$1,799
Couple:
$3,100
2024-2025 4-Month Membership (subject to availability)
Single:
$1,500
Couple:
$2,900
Additional Amenities
Customize your membership with these optional add-ons:
Large Locker:
$150
Small Locker:
$100
Bag Storage:
$130
Handicap Fee:
$55
Why Join Westchester Country Club?
Unlimited access to our 27-hole Karl Litten-designed course.
Access to exclusive dining experiences and events.
Discounts at the Pro Shop and restaurant.
Comprehensive amenities for a seamless golfing experience.
How to Join
For inquiries or to enroll in one of our membership programs, please call the Golf Shop at
